true.heading: Yes, discussion is allowed
false.heading: No, discussion is blocked
content.label: Allow this item to be discussed?
content.true.description: Users can create posts on this item.
content.false.description: Users cannot create posts on this item.
group.label: Can this group participate in discussions?
group.true.description: Group members can view and participate in discussion channels to which the group has access.
group.false.description: Group members cannot view or participate in discussion channels to which the group has access.
